org.everon.evbox.chargingstore.resources

类 ChargingResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.everon.evbox.chargingstore.resources.ChargingResource

  • @Path(value="/chargingSessions")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class ChargingResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Root resource (exposed at "chargingSessions" path)
    作者:
    Wang Long

    • 方法详细资料

      • getChargingSessions

        @GET
public java.util.List<ChargingSession> getChargingSessions()
        Method handling HTTP GET request.
        返回:
        all charging sessions in JSON format

      • addChargingSession

        @POST
public ChargingSession addChargingSession(ChargingSession chargingSession)
        Method handling HTTP POST request.
        参数:
        chargingSession - the charging session that will be created
        返回:
        the created charging session in JSON format

      • updateChargingSession

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{id}")
public ChargingSession updateChargingSession(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                          java.lang.String id)
        Method handling HTTP PUT request.
        参数:
        id - the id of the charging session that will be updated
        返回:
        the updated charging session in JSON format

      • summarizeChargingSessions

        @GET
 @Path(value="/summary")
public ChargingSummary summarizeChargingSessions()
        Method handling HTTP GET request with path "summary".
        返回:
        the summary of charging sessions for the last minute in JSON format
